list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: join or blend to form a single entity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: intermarriage had fused the families into a large unit
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giao tiếp đã hợp nhất các gia đình vào một đơn vị lớn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: provide (a circuit or electrical appliance) with a fuse.
fit a fuse to (a bomb, shell, or mine).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the bomb was fused to go off during a charity performance
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bom đã được hợp nhất để tắt trong một hiệu suất từ thiện

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a safety device consisting of a strip of wire that melts and breaks an electric circuit if the current exceeds a safe level.
a length of material along which a small flame moves to explode a bomb or firework, meanwhile allowing time for those who light it to move to a safe distance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a bomb on a short fuse
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một quả bom trên một cầu chì ngắn
